ai-iti67:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti67:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of sagacity.
ai-iti67:2.3_0: Sagacity of body, speech, and mind.
ai-iti67:2.4_0: These are the three kinds of sagacity.”
ai-iti67:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti67:3.1_0: “A sage in body, a sage in speech,
ai-iti67:3.4_0: has washed off all bad things, they say.”
ai-iti67:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
